channel.title: interview on DevOps Website
channel.description: Recent content in interview on DevOps Website

item.title: Arrested DevOps: State of Devops 2019
item.description: In this episode, hosts Jessica Kerr and Matty Stratton are joined by guests Dr. Nicole Forsgren and Mr. Jez Humble, two of the authors of the 2019 Accelerate State of DevOps report.

item.title: DevOps Radio Episode 18: Meet Patrick Debois, the Father of DevOps
item.description: In this episode of DevOps Radio, Patrick Debois, CTO of Small Town Heroes and founder of DevOps Days, discusses his vision behind the unification of IT teams through DevOps and the worldwide growth of this cultural IT phenomenon.
